If governments do not implement these changes, they are likely to face devastating economic consequences in the coming decades. Even if there is political resistance, experts insist that immediate action is fundamental to ensure future economic stability.

Many followers hope that the owners will soon announce details about their upcoming initiatives. The restaurant's departure underscores both the financial challenges faced by specialized establishments and the persistence of entrepreneurs dedicated to innovating in the culinary sector.
